data.name: Vylon Stella
data.desc: If this card is sent from the Monster Card Zone to the Graveyard: You can pay 500 Life Points, then target 1 face-up monster you control; equip this card to that target. At the end of the Damage Step, if the equipped monster battled an opponent's monster: Destroy that opponent's monster.

card_sets.set_name: Battle Pack 2: War of the Giants
Battle Pack 2: War of the Giants
